text: This is a list of the 300 members who were elected to the Hellenic Parliament in the 2019 legislative election, held on 7 July 2019. The parliament convened on 17 July 2019. == Composition == thumb|left|350px|Initial composition after the 2019 elections: {| class=wikitable sortable |- !colspan=2| Group !!
